title: Philippine President On Global Security
teaser: Philippine President Benigno Aquino III speaks about global security.
contentencoded:
Philippine President Benigno Aquino III addresses the United Nations Climate Summit today.

He spoke with Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson ahead of the summit about global security and the U.S.-Philippines relationship.

Guest

  • Benigno Aquino III, President of the Philippines. He tweets @noynoyaquino.
